players_online.wrong_user: You cannot use the menu because it was requested by someone else. Use /stop to stop the server.
players_online.question_singular:
There is still one player online: {player_name}
**Would you still like to stop the server?**
players_online.question_plural:
There are still {player_count} players online:{player_names}
**Would you still like to stop the server?**

add_world.description: SUPER-USER-ONLY: Creates a new reference to an installed Minecraft installation.

edit_world.description: SUPER-USER-ONLY: Edits the reference to an installed Minecraft installation.
edit_world.success: The world '{editing_world_name}' was edited succesfully! New values are:{values}

delete_world.description: SUPER-USER-ONLY: Deletes a reference to an installed Minecraft installation.
delete_world.success: The reference to the world '{display_name}' was deleted successfully!
delete_world.verification: Are you shure to delete the world '{display_name}'?{values}

error.current_world: You can't delete the current world. Change the current world with /change_world and restart the server.

change_world.description: Changes the current world into another available world.
change_world.placeholder: Choose the world you want to play
change_world.response: Choose the world you want to play:
change_world.success_online:
'{selected_value}' was successfully selected and will be started at the next start.
Would you like to restart now?
change_world.wrong_user_error: You cannot use the menu because it was requested by someone else. Use /change_world to change the world.

stop_without_shutdown.description: SUPER-USER-ONLY: Stops the Minecraft server, but doesn't shut off the host server.

restart.description: Restarts just the Minecraft server process, not the hole server.
restart.error: The Server is stopped. Use /start to start the server.

reset_busy.description: If the message that the bot is busy is sent by mistake, this command can reset the incorrect busy state.
reset_busy.verification: Do you really want to reset the bot's busy state? If so, errors may occur that can cause the bot to crash!
reset_busy.success: Reset of Busy state was successfully completed.
reset_busy.canceled: Busy state reset was successfully canceled.

error.general: The bot is not busy. Errors cannot be corrected.
error.wrong_user: You cannot use the menu because it was requested by someone else. Use /reset_busy to reset the busy state.

help.description: Displays all relevant commands from this bot with an explanation.
help.title: Relevant Commands

permission.busy: Please wait until the current operation is complete!
permission.sudo: You are not authorized to use this command. Ask your system administrator for changes.
